extension_description.message: Visual bookmarks, bookmarks sync across various browsers and absolute safety for your bookmarks

extension_shortname.message: Visual bookmarks, bookmarks sync across various browsers and absolute safety for your bookmarks

options_import_bookmark.description: Заголовок раздела импорта закладок из браузера

options_import_finish.message: Your bookmarks have been successfully imported!

pageaction_error_delete.message: Failed to delete bookmark. Try again later

settings_feedback_text.message: Feel free to ask questions, report bugs or submit your ideas about Atavi to support@atavi.com

settings_import_warning.description: Предупреждение о структуре папок при импорте
settings_import_warning.message: Atavi.com does not support a multi-level folders structure. All sub-folders will be placed at one level. Folders with the same name will be merged into one.

settings_newtab.message: Open Atavi bookmark manager in a new tab
